name: Mysterious Chef
description:
You are an apprentice. Your job is solve puzzles in order to deliver various strange ingredients to the chef. This short puzzle game was made for the Weekly Game Jam week 196 with the theme Strange Recipe.

Art by eeMalm

Programming by DragonMetals

Made in unity and using pixilart.com

P.S There might be bugs and possible softlocks but the game is short so don't be afraid to restart.

P.S.S Please don't spam the dialogue because it has a sometimes crashes. This should be fixed but just in case it isn't.
